name: Wendell's Extreme Feeding Contest
description:
This game was made in 11 days for a game jam with the theme "One Chance".

You play as Wendell, a washed-up professional feeding (former) champion who has been driven into a 9-5 job selling retirement plans. You can't take it anymore. There's still a fire within you; the drive to show the world that you can feed with the rest of 'em! NOW GO SHOW THEM WHAT YOU'RE MADE OF!

Made by Kazmuir and Kyle!

KazzualGamer (Kazmuir):

https://kazmuir.com

https://kazzualgamer.itch.io
